commandBid.label: Bid Command
commandBid.tooltip: With this command users can bid

commandStartBid.label: Start Bid Command
commandStartBid.tooltip: With this command the Caster can start an auction

commandStopBid.label: Stop Bid Command
commandStopBid.tooltip: With this command the Caster can stop an auction

languageBidNotRunning.value: An active bid is currently not running!
languageBidNotRunning.label: languageBidNotRunning

languageBidAlreadyStarted.value: Bid is already in progress. Stop the bid first!
languageBidAlreadyStarted.label: languageBidAlreadyStarted

languageBidNoCooldownParam.value: Please use the correct syntax: {0} <1-999 seconds>
languageBidNoCooldownParam.label: languageBidNoCooldownParam

languageBidGameStarted.value: {0} has opend an auction. Type {1} <1-9999> to place a bid!
languageBidGameStarted.label: languageBidGameStarted
